headline: UBS Reduces Its Price Target on Extra Space Storage Inc. (EXR) to $160, Keeps ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE:EXR) is one of the 13 Best Warehouse and Self-Storage Stocks to Buy Right Now. On September 16, 2025, UBS reduced its price target on Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE:EXR) from $169 to $160, maintaining a ‘Buy’ rating. The price revision is driven by Extra Space Storage Inc. (NYSE:EXR)’s steady fundamentals […]
